name: SKULL FEAST
description: SKULL FEAST - is a competitive third person hack-and-slash skill-based melee action game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 MB available space
